title: Lady in the Tower: Rapunzel
description: Previous cover edition for ASIN B0774YLNV4Rapunzel de Bar is one of seven siblings cursed by the evil witch, Hecuba. She has been kidnapped by the old woman and kept in a tower that has one window and no doors. When she tires of waiting for her brothers to rescue her, Rapunzel decides to escape on her own. One stormy night while the witch is away, Rapunzel uses her braid to lower herself out the tower window. She cuts her braid and falls atop a rider passing by below.Marco Drago del Rossi III is on the tail of a man he's been chasing when a woman drops from the sky and knocks him off his horse. She is beautiful, but he is furious that now he's lost his bounty as well as his steed. The woman asks for his help to escape her prison, but her curse and an old witch make the matter complicated.Can a Dragon Lord in training and a cursed lady find love amongst all the turmoil that magic has placed in their lives? And is escape even an option for Rapunzel with a curse so dark that Marco is forced to push his past aside and risk everything for the girl he loves?Love knows no bounds, and sometimes a prison is not physical . . . but self-made.
author: Elizabeth Rose
